name: The Cruise (itch) (Mike Lee)
description:
You are on a cruise with your wife, what could go wrong?

A short walking simulator game about with an "interesting" story twist.

This game was created in 3 days during Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #4. Theme is Underwater

Follow me on : https://twitter.com/MikeLeeGameDev

---Basic Controls---

MovementW,A,S,DInteractF

---Bugs Found---

There is some problem with the main menu after finishing the game. Alt + F4 to force quit if you're stuck in the main menu.
